name: Samantha Samu
description: Samantha Samu, also known asIsamu, is a member of theTyger ClawsinCyberpunk 2077. In2077, she was tasked—alongside her crew—to take out some dealers by the name of Gakuto and Choki, whom were conducting drug deals on Tyger Claw turf. She and her crew caught both of the underage dealers at a basketball court on Kennedy street, across ofLizzie's Bar, inLittle China,Watson, where they were executed.
